Strings.Text:
Displayed on the screen in the 
center of the desk, is some {pause}{clear}kind of engineering drawing.{pause}{clear}The engineering drawing looks 
like it's for a “Timegate” but it {pause}{clear}is not the same as the one 
Dylan and Regina are familiar {pause}{clear}with.{pause}
On the other side of the glass \nare many partly built equipments {pause}{clear}and \nintruments.{pause}
On the other side of the glass \nare many instruments never {pause}{clear}seen before. A circular shaped \ninstrument is installed in the {pause}{clear}center of the other instruments.{pause}
Many computers are installed for \ndata anaylsis of experiments.{pause}
Many computers are installed for \ndata anaylsis of experiments.{pause}
Many computers are installed for \ndata anaylsis of experiments.{pause}
